name: Buzzy
description: A vibrant electric fish that glides through water with incredible speed. Specializes in inflicting status conditions and outmaneuvering opponents.

ability.name: Static Current
ability.description: Electric moves have 50% chance to paralyze. Speed is doubled when any status condition is active on the field.

moves.name: Thunder Shock
moves.description: A weak electric attack that may paralyze the target.

moves.name: Aqua Ring
moves.description: Creates a veil of water that gradually restores HP.

moves.name: Thunder Wave
moves.description: A weak electric charge that paralyzes the target.

moves.name: Electro Ball
moves.description: Hurls an electric orb. More powerful the faster the user.

habitat: Electric coral reefs and charged waters
